Html:
Hello

I am working on a custom datagrid column that contains a usercontrol. The usercontrol itself contains a textbox and a button. The custom column is derived from DataGridTextColumn because I like to have binding support.

Can anybody give me a hint / example of how to implement GenerateEditingElement so that the column binding is used for the usercontrols textbox binding?

All is fine but changes I make to the textbox.text are not going back, although all bindings are TwoWay

Any help would be appreciated

Klaus
